title: CSL Recruitment 2025 - Apply Online for 19 Outfit Assistant Posts
description: The Cochin Shipyard Limited (CSL) has officially released the notification to fill the vacancies of 19 Outfit Assistant Posts. Interested and eligible candidates can use this opportunity to apply for these posts before the last date of application. Candidates who have completed their 10th pass and ITI can apply for the CSL Recruitment 2025 . The interested applicants can apply in online mode. Here we have mentioned the education details, age limit, selection process, application fee, salary, ...
